checks.name: Room system architect baseline files exist
details: policy, room api/crypto/manager, and workflows found

checks.name: Rooms enforce default 24h expiry and 50-member cap
details: room creation defaults and max-members guardrails are enforced

checks.name: Room owner/admin can remove members
details: api and room manager expose owner-only member-removal controls

checks.name: Group room encryption uses sender-key protocol semantics
details: sender-specific key derivation and routing are active in room crypto path

checks.name: Room-system policy is documented and actionable
details: policy captures expiry, membership, sender-key, and verifier controls

checks.name: CI/release workflows enforce room-system architect verification
details: room-system architect gate is wired in CI and release workflows
